title: 1977 Chico State Wildcats football team
text:
The 1977 Chico State Wildcats football team represented <a href="Chico%20State%20University">Chico State University</a> during the <a href="1977%20NCAA%20Division%20II%20football%20season">1977 NCAA Division II football season</a>. Chico State competed in the <a href="Far%20Western%20Conference">Far Western Conference</a> in 1977.
The 1977 Wildcats were led by fourth-year head coach Dick Trimmer. They played home games at University Stadium in <a href="Chico%2C%20California">Chico, California</a>. Chico State finished the season with a record of six wins, two losses and one tie (6–2–1, 3–1–1 FWC). The Wildcats outscored their opponents 159–137 for the season.
Team players in the NFL.
No Chico State players were selected in the <a href="1978%20NFL%20Draft">1978 NFL Draft</a>.
